attributes.action: block admission of the members of 'Westboro baptist church' into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the above's intention to protest outside the production 'Laramie Project' on the 20th of February, as advertised on their website http://www.godhatesfags.com, we, the undersigned, demand that Home Secretary Jacqui Smith refuse these individuals entry into the UK in line with the nations policy protecting LGBT people.
We believe that to allow them entry would permit them to spread their anti-LGBT message, promoting hatred over acceptance
